scripts.generate-fixtures: shx rm -rf output && npm run clean-dts && dojo build && npm run clean-dts && dojo build --mode dev && npm run clean-dts && dojo build --mode test
scripts.generate-unix-fixtures: npm run generate-fixtures && shx cp -r output/* fixtures/unix/
scripts.generate-windows-fixtures: npm run generate-fixtures && shx cp -r output/* fixtures/windows/
